channel.title: Connection Lost Reward for help
channel.description:
i type the server and my name and pass then hit log in and it shows the screen but it will just say "loading" or "connection lost please wait" will not let me on at all if any one can help me get this away so i can get on it ill award you with some runescape money (100k) thank you very much
wont let me put a picture up there =\ but need help please.!

@D_A_N wrote:

Try deleting your most recently added npcs. Thats sometimes the problem.

item.title: Connection Lost Reward for help
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

[quote=“madmax40, post:5, topic:15218”]i get the same problem , no-one can access it , they get the same error , when i re-install my source it works perfect for about 15mins then when i log out , and try to get back in i get the error , 4 of my friends have the same error whilst logging into my server.[/quote]hmm…1.most servers have an auto mod bot installed to ban autoers and noclipers if you noclip and then log out you wont be able to get back on to fix theis just go to data file and click on bannedusers and delete your name
or
2.your compiler is out of memory space and needes to be recompiled thats all i know lol

Read full topic

item.title: Connection Lost Reward for help

item.description:
@madmax40 wrote:

i get the same problem , no-one can access it , they get the same error , when i re-install my source it works perfect for about 15mins then when i log out , and try to get back in i get the error , 4 of my friends have the same error whilst logging into my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Connection Lost Reward for help
item.dc:creator: @hyper1 hyper1
item.description:
@hyper1 wrote:

ok are u trying to log into ur own server or sum1 elses? if its sum1 elses it there fault not urs. if its ur own u messed sumthing up in ur client.java file and it cant read it.
hope that helps ?

Read full topic
